website_summaries.verdict: A medium-coverage foundation that's hydrating and available in a wide selection of colors.
pros: Provides medium coverage that fans say is just right
Blends into the skin nicely and feels lightweight yet moisturizing
Made without fragrance or harsh ingredients
cons: Some customers experienced irritations or breakouts after using it
Doesn't wear well on very oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit product, definitely not Clinique. Made my face break out (which of course prompted me to use more of this product), until I realized it had an off smell to it, and the second bottle was worse. (I made the mistake of buying 3 of this product.)
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Clinique - Incorrect Foundation Color
customer_reviews.text: I want to qualify my rating by indicating that I like Clinique products and my issue is with the ordering process itself. I was under the impression I ordered Clinique Porcelain Beige foundation, however, I received Ivory instead. When going to return the item, I found that it was shipped from Great Britain and that I had to return it at my cost. I actually ordered 3 Clinique items at the same time. Each one apparently came from a different supplier asall arrived at different times. Not a very efficient way to obtain one's cosmetics. I won't be ordering Clinique on line again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M.

customer_reviews.title: NOT the same color, do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Ivory 28 is NOT the same color as Ivory 3. I understand Clinique re-numbered their colors but Ivory 28 is obviously darker, and not the same color. I was buying Ivory for years at a beauty counter and bought this thinking it was the same but I will not buy this again and want to warn others that what you see is NOT what you're getting. Buyer be warned!
customer_reviews.author: doylecat

customer_reviews.title: Natural feel, hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Nice subtle glow- looks very natural. I have hyperpigmentation and use este lauder double wear (very thick foundation) I was looking for something light weight to cover up the dark spots. I loved the feel of clinque- super light weight as if I'm not even wearing foundation. Unfortunately it didn't cover my dark spots, however I mix it with este lauder and WOW it really blends nicely and completely changed the look of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and doesn't rub off
customer_reviews.text: I was given a foundation that was one shade too light when I visited a makeup store. I ordered this foundation one shade darker than I had and the color is perfect. In winter I may use the other one. This goes on smoothly and as the makeup artists say, "evens out my skin tone."
customer_reviews.author: Southwest Woman

customer_reviews.title: This is the most I have ever spent on foundation but it worth it because it is better than any grocery store foundation i have e
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth. Does not accentuate my pores & it covers my acne scars. This is the most I have ever spent on foundation but it worth it because it is better than any grocery store foundation i have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Trench worker

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation. This is my second purchase of it. It covers well and goes on nice and even and smooth's out my complexion nicely. Easy to build coverage if needed but it does give good coverage without the need to build. I will say that I haven't noticed any difference in my skin tone in terms of it saying it also "corrects" so that is disappointing but still as a foundation, it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It goes on great and the coverage is pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It goes on great and the coverage is pretty good. I would say it is like a foundation and powder combined. The only problem is it makes me a little oily in my T Zone. So i mainly use this on my checks and neck ( on the neck i add a little primer makes it easier to spread)
customer_reviews.author: chatums

customer_reviews.title: Love this foundation
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup. I have used it for awhile and is the best for my dry skin. It is light and smooth . Thank you Amazon that I was able to find this . With everything shut down this made it so nice to be able to order and it was perfect in color as well. I would recommend this and shipping was good even though the makeup box was opened , all seemed fine. It cost me more to drive somewhere usually to buy it so ordering is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! At first I was skeptical because it looked too dewy, and I have oily skin already. But then it settled into a nice semi matte look!! Looks natural yet covers enough
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. Too dry, not enough coverage. I like the Clinique brand and used it for years, but this is just not as good as the foundation they used to make. My skin is dry, so I need a creamier foundation. This one did not go on evenly or smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Best Clinique foundation for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for years and was so happy to find it on Amazon since there are no stores on the Island where we moved that carry it. It's lightweight, has the perfect blend for my skin tone, stays on all day and is perfect for my dry skin. I will never change from this product and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: I like that it blends in with my skin tone very ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this make up for while. I like that it blends in with my skin tone very well which is hard sometimes with fair skin. I also like how it gives coverage but feels very light on your skin. It also stays on all day but is easy remove at bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Foundation felt good. Covered most of my long work day
customer_reviews.text: Foundation felt good. Covered most of my long work day. I liked that it was luminous. Could have used a little more coverage. It was barely more than a tinted moisturizer. Also very disappointed with the color. Did research to find that Alabaster was supposed for the fairest, cool skinned person. It's still very yellow and a little dark, so I can't recommend it for anyone uktra pale with pink undertones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has spf and goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Always difficult to order makeup when it comes to the color. I ordered fair and it has a slight yellow tone but not so much that I can’t use. Has an spf which is important to me. Goes on smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. A little goes a long way, it is good for wrinkles (doesn't make them look more defined) and it feels nice on. Seems to improve skin quality too
customer_reviews.author: joyce bouton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this foundation, great coverage without feeling heavy or cakey. It’s just more than what I want to pay (I’m cheap lol) currently looking for a dupe! But truth be told it is a great product and my sensitive skin took it very well
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: Just a few drops away from smooth skin!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product for years. I am way past 70, and people compliment me on my "beautiful skin." Feel they are NOT just "being nice!" Ginny Hebel North Port, Fl.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Hate the bottle
customer_reviews.text: I tried this as a replacement for my Clinique Fit, it has good coverage but not as light as I hoped. Also it's a pain to get out the little squeeze bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Leon

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Clinique
customer_reviews.text: Great to actually buy my makeup from my dressing table the moment I realize I am almost out! Life does not get any better for a busy lady!
customer_reviews.author: SB GUNN

customer_reviews.title: Convenient purchase, and love the quality and SPF factor.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I was able to purchase this online since them all where I usually buy is closed now. Love that this product has an SPF factor.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bounce

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking lightweight no irritation- I’ll use no other!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and Clinique is the only one I can use without having any kind of irritation. The color I purchase is neutral 05 and it’s a perfect match for my skin tone! It’s lightweight, good coverage and natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: ... using it for a week and so far so good. The color is perfect can hardly tell I ...
customer_reviews.text: I only have been using it for a week and so far so good. The color is perfect can hardly tell I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Not a Clinique product
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real! Not sure what is different but I have been using this makeup for a long time and it is not the same! Very very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good product reasonably priced compared with other higher end foundations
customer_reviews.text: Matches my skin perfectly, reasonably priced. Covers easily but doesn't mat. I mix a small amount with a similar amount of day moisturizer so it's not too thick and spreads more smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Merry-Lin B

customer_reviews.title: The shades online are not color true.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered vanilla and was much darker than it looked online and much too dark for my ivory skin. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a few years now and it's great! Hint: I leave it capped upside down so I can get every drop out.
customer_reviews.author: worship2AbbaFather

customer_reviews.title: Color Failure
customer_reviews.text: This color is so much darker. I've ordered the exact same thing each time and this one is completely different shade. Horribly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this makeup all the time and it's cheaper than going to the Clinique counter. You don't receive a gift, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nell

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot review this personally, but it is the only makeup my mom will permit me to buy for her. That's got to say something!
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Miester, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: No fragrance which is awesome cause I have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Bozo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to blend my dark spot on my cheeks. I have been using this product for a couple of years. Well covered. It is darker than my skin color but this is suppose to be. Because I am using for only for shadowing. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but I ordered a #8. I got the product today and it's a CN 74 beige (M). I even double checked what I ordered and it says 8. I tried the color and I think it will work and it's easier than returning, etc. Just disappointed it's not what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy Grube

customer_reviews.title: I really like this makeup
customer_reviews.text: I really like this makeup. My teenage daughter was borrowing from me so bought her some for herself. It doesn't feel like you are wearing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite foundation
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this Foundation for many years and I love the coverage, the look And it lasts a long time.I have found no better foundation then this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Helped even out my skin tone AND reduce acne! I have pretty bad cystic acne and this stuff works wonders!!!
customer_reviews.author: GM3119

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking I could save a few dollars but it was totally fake. Not Clinique makeup. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOUNDATION!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this foundation for years and use Clinique products most of my life. This is an excellent foundation that really covers without caking. Definitely not drug store prices but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Tom with patience

customer_reviews.title: Best foundation
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and I love it. It was even recommended by a high-end skincare professional I know as the only foundation to use, if you have to use foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clinique! One of the very few foundations that I’m not allergic too & doesn’t cause acne. Light and easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: LadyFF

customer_reviews.title: This is the only foundation I ever use
customer_reviews.text: I do wish it was cheaper, but I love this stuff. Doesn't look like makeup but covers well, and seems to have a serum in it and really does make your skin look and feel better. I haven't bought anything else in years, nothing compares.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not as I expected
customer_reviews.text: A bit thinner than I like...lightest color not light enough for fair complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It covers dark spots nicely
customer_reviews.text: ONly a drop goes a long way and it does not feel heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Parry

customer_reviews.title: Quality foundation
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite foundation. I got the color matched to my skin in a department store but I can buy it cheaper on Amazon than anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Been using for years. Love getting it right to my door!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: So much easier to buy on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this product for years! Every time I switch to a different brand, I am always disappointed and come back to Clinique. I love how simple it is to buy online instead of dealing with the pushy people at the cosmetic counter.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: It has good coverage for unevenly colored skin
customer_reviews.text: I've worn it for years. It has good coverage for unevenly colored skin. It looks like you're wearing make up. It's not invisible, but there a time for that when you need to even out the color. It's not the invisible look for young people, but it's not painted on looking either.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of makeup been using it for years
customer_reviews.author: franny

customer_reviews.title: Clinique products are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these products for a long time, they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: terry vinco

customer_reviews.title: No lines
customer_reviews.text: Always used Clinique , while I prefer to support local business . We don’t have any - it’s all chain so if I must buy from a chain I went amazon , I didn’t have to put up with anyone .
customer_reviews.author: amy w.

customer_reviews.title: Like the coverage but does not stay on for more than 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.text: I like the coverage it provides. Not too thick yet provides coverage for aging skin. I just wished it stayed on for more than 3-4 hours. Then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Protima Chhabra

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: Wore clinique for years. Switched around. Came back to this Even Better, and it is even better. Great for oily skin!!
customer_reviews.author: kbolden

customer_reviews.title: Not the same colors
customer_reviews.text: They changed the shade of Ivory so what I received did not match my skin tone at all!
customer_reviews.author: Eynat Eshel

customer_reviews.title: I like this make up
customer_reviews.text: I like this make up, although it's a bit on the heavy side. Mostly I like being able to buy it on Amazon instead of in a department store. The cosmetic counters are never staffed anymore! No more department store for me - Amazon rules.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieD

customer_reviews.title: Pale with reddish undertones
customer_reviews.text: good color match - stays on for about 4 hours. Not cakey but can be a little streaky if you are heavy handed. Little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: KarCam

customer_reviews.title: so glad to have my foundation
customer_reviews.text: I dislike having to spend more then I normally do, but glad to have it.. received it today!
customer_reviews.author: catydid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brand, moisturizing result
customer_reviews.text: Always been a fan of this brand for days when you don't need intense, corporate coverage. Love the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace one I used up and it came perfect. Same as one i would pick up at any makeup counter in a dept store. So convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: Cover Up
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this makeup. It goes on easily with a makeup brush, it matches my skin tone beautifully, and it evens out splotches on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gilpin

customer_reviews.title: The best foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I love the formula. Always goes on smooth and never causes breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki M

customer_reviews.title: Best for your skin
customer_reviews.text: Clinique is the best hands down. My nose ring was getting infected from other brands of foundation no matter what I did or cleaned it with. I can leave Clinique on overnight and my skin is perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: morgan adams

customer_reviews.title: Gooey replacement for discontinued line
customer_reviews.text: Was suggested for me to replace discontinued line and my need for more coverage and moisture (older skin). Works well, light coverage. Glides on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ive used Clinique Even Better for a very long time
customer_reviews.text: Ive used Clinique Even Better for a very long time. Ive tried a few other foundations to see if they were better...haven't found any yet that were!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper then the mall
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Matches my skin perfect and it's actually good for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: SHERRY L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup! It covers well but still feels weightless. It keeps my skin clear and acne free.
customer_reviews.author: Kara W

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful full coverage makeup
customer_reviews.text: Takes only a small amount to cover. Lasts long and covers a lot of flaws.
customer_reviews.author: NAL

customer_reviews.title: Great foundation
customer_reviews.text: When Benefit discontinued their Playsticks foundation, I was devastated. Found this as a replacement and it's second best to those.
customer_reviews.author: highflyer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my skin and protect from oily skin but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for my skin and protect from oily skin but be careful not to wear get high collar or turtle neck because it can rub it from makeup; sometime it doesn't come off with wash.
customer_reviews.author: Laura J. Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: nice for young girls with acne, need more moisture in my makeup
customer_reviews.text: its nice, but has a lot of yellow in it, need a make up with that is creamer, this is really for people with skin that break's out a lot, I prefer a creamer makeup.
customer_reviews.author: joyce tuscano

customer_reviews.title: covers spots beautifully, very good
customer_reviews.text: one bottle has lasted a year. very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to Prescriptives
customer_reviews.text: When Prescriptives went under, I tried lots of alternatives without loving them till I found this. Light but with adequate coverage and staying power. A little goes a long way. Can get a good match for my very fair skin which isn't always easy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: I honestly can't tell if it helps my dark spots ...
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't tell if it helps my dark spots, but I prefer it over other foundations because it's supposedly healthier
customer_reviews.author: dia

customer_reviews.title: good texture
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The color is perfect matches my skin tone, goes on nice and smooth. I'm really not sure about how it says reduces wrinkles. I haven't notice any difference in my wrinkles
customer_reviews.author: tasha butler

customer_reviews.title: I love this product and have used it for a while
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for a while. I have melasma and some acne spots. This is great coverage without looking like I have a ton of makeup on!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Love this even for my fine lines!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for years! Love the finish and how easy it blends with a brush. SPF is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this product and I paid less money for it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: I love this foundatuon
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundatuon. Makes my skin look amazing. I can wear a powder over or just the foundation and it looks great. Doesn't clog my pores either. Will be REbuying this wHen it's out
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Completely fake item. Color not even close. Packaging different than real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: darker than the picture
customer_reviews.text: liked the texture and coverage but definitely darker than the picture. My skin too light for this. Maybe if I had a really good tan
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is perfect for my skin. I have very dry flakey skin and it's hard to find a foundation that doesn't look cakey. This foundation does the trick. I would recomend this product to anyone with dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: butterflypants

customer_reviews.title: Love clinique products
customer_reviews.text: I love clinique products because never causes acne and moisturize my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Yilmix

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I love the lightweight feel of this foundation and its great coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Basso

customer_reviews.title: Best make-up ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best foundation I have ever used. At 57 yrs I was leery, because of it settling into lines. Takes a very small amount to cover, then set with loose powder. Very, Very, Very happy with this product, great price too.
customer_reviews.author: chery

customer_reviews.title: When you know your shade order on line ;)
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was faster than going to the mall to purchase and it was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used it for years and the older my skin gets it still looks young and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: 3leakt

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. Great coverage and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon P.

customer_reviews.title: Another Good C;inique Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the coverage this make-up gives, but it's not heavy. I can wear it all day and it looks like I just put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Orthodoxy

customer_reviews.title: Even if you have bought same product/color in store it appears to me it’s slightly different.
customer_reviews.text: Product color appeared to be darker than what I had bought before in a store. No fault on Clinique hard to judge on line.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H.

customer_reviews.title: Pity service.
customer_reviews.text: different style to the one that I requested, in the label is the correct one and the incorecto box, pity service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very pleased although a little powder is needed to cover the shine.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Schreiner

customer_reviews.title: Great way to buy makeup when you don't want to deal with salesperson
customer_reviews.text: I originally got my skin matched to a makeup color at a Clinique counter in Macy's, but ended up buying many more items because I was talked into them by the salesperson. Now I just order the color I want online and don't get pushed or tempted into buying more than I want!
customer_reviews.author: Finn

customer_reviews.title: Good foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup but it is darker than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup i had !
customer_reviews.text: Since i found this makeup i keep ordering it . It is very light weight if you have normal to oily skin. evens out skin tone in a natural way and very smooth looking . Last for very long hours. I even exercise with it sometimes and it never clogged my pores . Amazing !
customer_reviews.author: Eyal H

customer_reviews.title: Not full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Not full coverage! Like I wanted also if you don't get the powder it looks shiny or greasy...
customer_reviews.author: Jane96373

customer_reviews.title: Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit product. Do not buy. Definitely not Clinique and disgusted that there are people in the world who do this sort of thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clinique Makeup
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years and I love it. It’s not too heavy yet still gives me the coverage I’m looking for.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Would like to return. Wrong shade and very oily
customer_reviews.text: Wrong shade and would not let me return. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: Madeline mcavoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only foundation that won't break me out; I forget that I have it on!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a long time and love it
customer_reviews.author: jo y

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Very good foundation, excellent coverage, I'm buying as a second time and for sure I'm going to by very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

product_meta.title: Clinique Even Better Makeup SPF15 - CN 10 Alabaster 30ml / 1 fl.oz.
product_meta.description: Color:01 Alabaster VF-NLook after your skin with this powerful foundation from Clinique. It protects against future discolouration of the skin and helps to even out your skin tone while SPF15 protects against UV damage. Skin immediately looks brighter without a heavy look and skin tone is corrected over time.
feature_bullets: Provides a medium to full coverage application.
It is recommended for morning wear.
